backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing blog CRUD, user profile storage, and permission-checked admin/user operations using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests related to removing custom cursors in the React and standalone apps.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of numerous frontend files including pages, components, and standalone assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and loading the React app root script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, global layout, query client, and theming provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component that restricts access to admin pages based on Internet Identity authentication and admin checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication state and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/cursor/CustomCur: Empty file placeholder for removed custom cursor component.
frontend/src/components/forms/StudentEnq: Student enquiry form collecting details and generating a WhatsApp message, showing a confirmation card after submission.
frontend/src/components/forms/TeacherEnq: Teacher application form capturing multi-select teaching preferences and sending a WhatsApp-ready summary after submission.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Simple marketing contact form with client-side validation, simulated submission, and a thank-you state.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Marketing site footer with navigation links, contact details, social links, and branding.
Responsive marketing header with navigation, mobile menu, and quick access to the student form.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: Contact section offering WhatsApp and phone contact options plus navigation to a detailed contact page.
Renders a FAQ section using accordion items populated from siteContent FAQs.
Displays the main hero banner with headline, CTAs, feature bullets, and an image, with navigation actions.
Shows a fourâ€‘step process grid explaining how the service works with icons and descriptions.
Lists tutoring service categories in a card grid with icons and short descriptions.
Renders testimonial cards with quotes, ratings, and user details from siteContent.
Displays trust statistics such as experience, students, and teachers using icon cards.
Presents key value propositions in a grid of cards with icons and brief descriptions.
frontend/src/content/legalContent.ts: Exports structured terms and conditions content with headings, descriptions, and metadata.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Provides marketing content including hero text, value propositions, services, steps, testimonials, and FAQs.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines site-wide static content including contact info, social links, subjects, classes, boards, languages, modes, trust stats, testimonials, and FAQs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomCursor.ts: Empty placeholder hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates the document title and meta description based on provided page metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for CRUD blog operations and user profile/admin checks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, base styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp message content for student/teacher forms and builds WhatsApp and phone links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBlogsPage.tsx: Admin interface for creating, editing, publishing, and deleting blog posts with dialog forms and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post by ID with loading, not-found, and published checks, and sets page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all published blogs with loading skeletons, summaries, and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows WhatsApp and phone contact options with links and office hours, using configured contact data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main homepage composed of marketing sections and sets basic SEO metadata.
Defines a marketing landing layout with header/footer and manually sets document title and description.
frontend/src/pages/SetupChecklistPage.ts: Presents a configuration checklist with completion status using siteContent values.
frontend/src/pages/StudentFormPage.tsx: Displays the student enquiry form with accompanying metadata and page header.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherFormPage.tsx: Shows the teacher registration form with metadata and an introductory header.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders terms and conditions content with title, last updated date, and sectioned text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone: Defines the static landing page structure with sections rendered dynamically by script.js.
Explains the standalone HTML/CSS/JS landing page files and how to run them locally.
Contains a content configuration object used to populate all landing page sections dynamically.
Provides styling for the standalone landing page, including layout, typography, and responsive components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling plugins, theme extensions, and custom colors, fonts, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the current project metadata, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the GrowWithTutor site.
